sentences.en: "The colonnade is a highly allegorical artistic representation of an ecumenical embrace of the universal Church to all people, " said the Vatican newspaper.
sentences.cn: 梵蒂冈日报称，广场的柱廊是一种高度的艺术表现形式，喻意着大教堂对所有人的接纳。

sentences.en: At last, we enlarge the system to more ecumenical form system and get some similar conclusion.
sentences.cn: 最后把方程组的形式推广到更为一般的情况并得到了类似的结论.

sentences.en: He was deeply involved in the ecumenical movement.
sentences.cn: 他积极参与了促进基督教各派大联合的运动。

sentences.en: In response to those divisions, the mainline denominations have attempted to come together through ecumenical movement.
sentences.cn: 针对这些分歧, 主要的宗派已经尝试要通过教会合一运动来达到统一.

sentences.en: The ceiling is painted with frescos, among which the four larger - sized depict the ecumenical councils.
sentences.cn: 屋顶绘满壁画,较大四幅描绘了教会会议的情景.

sentences.en: This example has been an inspiration to the modern Ecumenical Movement.
sentences.cn: 这一事例对现代泛基督教主义运动是个启示.

sentences.en: Two ecumenical bodies facilitate co - operative work among the Protestant churches in Hong Kong.
sentences.cn: 本港有两个基督教团体,负责推行基督教会的联合事工.
